Actions.Text: AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO ECONOMIC DEVELOPMENT

Title: Relates to an exemption for certain property from the prohibition of alcohol sales within a certain distance from a church
Summary: Exempts certain property in the borough of Manhattan from the prohibition of alcohol sales for on-premises consumption within a certain distance from a church.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the alcoholic beverage control law, in relation to a license to sell liquor at retail for consumption on certain premises
